select P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.NAME, P.DESCRIPTION, P.PRICE, P.QUANTITY, P.CREATED_DATE from PRODUCT_TB P WHERE 1=1
AND (P.PRODUCT_NUMBER LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%' OR P.NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchInput} || '%')
AND P.CREATED_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{fr_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND P.CREATED_DATE <= TO_DATE(#{to_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND P.PRODUCT_NUMBER IN ( SELECT M.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY_MAPPING_TB M JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY_TB C ON M.CATEGORY_ID = C.ID WHERE C.ID = #{category} )
AND P.PRODUCT_NUMBER IN ( SELECT S.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM STOCK_TB S JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = S.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE S.LAST_UPDATED >= TO_DATE(#{fr_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
AND P.PRODUCT_NUMBER IN ( SELECT S.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM STOCK_TB S JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = S.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE S.LAST_UPDATED <= TO_DATE(#{fr_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') )
AND P.PRODUCT_NUMBER IN ( SELECT S.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM STOCK_TB S JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = S.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE S.QUANTITY >= #{stock_min} )
AND P.PRODUCT_NUMBER IN ( SELECT S.PRODUCT_NUMBER FROM STOCK_TB S JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = S.PRODUCT_NUMBER WHERE S.QUANTITY <= #{stock_max} )
